Definition: You are given a piece of text. Your task is to classify the text based on whether it contains hate speech directed at a religion or a person/group of people based on their religion. If the text contains hate speech directed at a religion, answer with 'religious hate'. If the text does not contain hate speech directed at a religion, answer with 'not religious hate'.
